clue.en: The whole duration of a being, whether animal, plant, or other kind, being alive.
clue.zh: 一个生物（无论是动物、植物还是其他物种）活着的整个持续时间。

clue.en: A mathematical statement of some importance that has been proven to be true. Minor __s are often called propositions. __s which are not very interesting in themselves but are an essential part of a bigger __'s proof are called lemmas.
clue.zh: 已被证明是正确的具有一定重要性的数学陈述。小定理通常称为命题。本身不是很有趣但是更大定理证明的重要组成部分的定理称为引理。

clue.en: A very large and destructive wave, generally caused by a tremendous disturbance in the ocean, such as an undersea earthquake or volcanic eruption. __ are usually a series of waves, or wave train.
clue.zh: 一种非常大的破坏性波浪，通常由海洋中的巨大扰动引起，例如海底地震或火山爆发。海啸通常是一系列波浪或波列。

clue.en: To perform a work or labour; to exert power or strength, physical or mechanical; to act.
clue.zh: 进行工作或劳动；发挥物理或机械的力量或力量；采取行动。

clue.en: (with the, invariable plural only) People who are __; __ beings; the __er generation, taken as a group.
clue.zh: （仅适用于不变的复数形式）年老的人；老众生；老一代人作为一个群体。

clue.en: Something being indicated that is here; one of these.
clue.zh: 这里有一些指示；其中之一。

clue.en: A measure of the extent of a surface; it is measured in square units.
clue.zh: 表面范围的测量；它以平方单位测量。

clue.en: (furniture) Following or imitating a style popular during the First French __ (1804–1814).
clue.zh: （家具）遵循或模仿法兰西第一帝国（1804-1814）期间流行的风格。

clue.en: An image made in the skin with ink and a needle.
clue.zh: 用墨水和针在皮肤上形成的图像。

clue.en: Self-referential; structured analogously, but at a higher level.
clue.zh: 自我参照；结构类似，但层次更高。
